text:
Hello guys :spock-hand:.

I was playing with the HubSpot Landing Pages, and was wondering if there is a way, to add a form for registering a user. Right now I found a way add a form, but the form submits a new user, and sends an email.

What I would like, would be to somehow add an API call with the user information, and register it on our own server/database.

Also, while reading and going through the options of Forms, I wasn't able to find an input field for password.

Do you know if this is possible? To create a form with Email & Password and send this data on my own API?

Thank you, and I hope I've asked this question on the right channel :joy:
does anyone know why the HS developer plugin not longer displays the Dev Menu, I have restarted chrome multiple times
Yea — I think HS updated their menu and it broke the plugin a bit. The application is open source. It’s likely a pretty easy fix if you want to go in and make a PR
I just made a PR to fix this.
